SELECT 
    c.customer_name,
    c.company_code,
    o.order_date,
    IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(p.unit_price * p.quantity), 2), 'No Records Found') AS TotalSale
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_code = o.salesman_code
LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
LEFT JOIN products p ON oi.product_code = p.product_code
WHERE c.country = "USA"
GROUP BY c.customer_name, c.company_code, o.order_date;
VIEW_ORDER:
CREATE VIEW VIEW_ORDER
AS
SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_id, p.product_name, o.order_date, 
       SUM(od.quantity * p.price) AS total_value
FROM orders o
JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE c.customer_id = 1;

CREATE VIEW VIEW_ORDER
AS
SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_id, pr.product_name, o.order_date
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products pr ON oi.product_id = pr.product_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;

CHECK_INVENTORY: SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity FROM sales_db.check_inventory i INNER JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY c.company_name;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM products p 
JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id 
JOIN sales_db.check_inventory ci ON i.product_id = ci.product_id 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON ci.customer_id = ( SELECT T2.customer_id FROM customers T2 WHERE T2.company_name = 'Omniplex Corporation' AND T2.contact_name = 'Lance Loei' );

SELECT c.customer_id, o.order_id, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM sales_db.check_inventory i 
INNER JOIN sales_db.orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id 
INNER JOIN sales_db.products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
INNER JOIN sales_db.sales s ON i.order_id = s.order_id GROUP BY i.product_id;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 

FROM inventory i 

INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 

INNER JOIN sales_order so ON i.order_id = so.order_id 

INNER JOIN customers c ON so.customer_id = c.customer_id 

WHERE table_name = 'CHECK_INVENTORY' -- NOT A REAL MySQL TABLE 
AND DATE(sales_date) BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_code = p.code 
INNER JOIN sales s ON i.inventory_id = s.inventory_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' AND c.company_name = 'Toms Toys';

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales_order so ON i.order_id = so.order_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON so.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE p.category = 'CHECK_INVENTORY' GROUP BY c.contact_name;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales_checkin sc ON i.inventory_id = sc.inventory_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON sc.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE i.product_id = ( SELECT product_id FROM product WHERE product_name = 'CHECK_INVENTORY' ) ORDER BY c.company_name;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales s ON i.inventory_id = s.inventory_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = ( SELECT T2.customer_id FROM customers AS T2 INNER JOIN orders AS T3 ON T2.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T2.company_name = 'CHECK_INVENTORY' AND T3.order_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2015-12-31' GROUP BY T2.customer_id );

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM products p 
JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id 
JOIN CHECK_INVENTORY cv ON i.product_id = cv.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON cv.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE p.category='Electronics' AND c.company_name='TechCorp';

SELECT i.product_name, o.order_id, c.customer_id, ci.contact_name, co.company_name 
FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
INNER JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
INNER JOIN inventory i ON oi.product_id = i.product_id 
INNER JOIN company_info ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id 
LEFT JOIN company_info co ON c.customer_id = co.customer_id 
WHERE i.product_name IN (SELECT product_name FROM sales_db.check_inventory) AND o.order_date >= '2018-01-01';

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id 
JOIN sales_db.check_inventory ON p.product_id = check_inventory.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON check_inventory.customer_id = c.customer_id;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i 
JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN CHECK_INVENTORY cv ON i.inventory_id = cv.inventory_id 
JOIN customers c ON cv.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' AND i.quantity < 5 ORDER BY i.quantity;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales_checkin sc ON i.inventory_id = sc.inventory_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON sc.customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE company_name = 'Check Inventions' AND contact_name = 'Victoria Shields') GROUP BY c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name 
FROM products p 
JOIN orders o ON p.product_id=o.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id=c.customer_id 
JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id=i.product_id 
WHERE i.check_inventory < (SELECT AVG(check_inventory) FROM inventory);

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity FROM sales_db.check_inventory i INNER JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.contact_name;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name, i.quantity 
FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id 
INNER JOIN sales s ON i.inventory_id = s.inventory_id 
INNER JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = ( SELECT T2.customer_id FROM customers AS T2 INNER JOIN orders AS T3 ON T2.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T2.company_name = 'Eagle Incorporated' AND T3.order_date BETWEEN '1998-01-01' AND '1999-12-31' GROUP BY T2.customer_id ) 
WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id AND s.customer_id = ( SELECT T2.customer_id FROM customers AS T2 INNER JOIN orders AS T3 ON T2.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T2.company_name = 'Eagle Incorporated' AND T3.order_date BETWEEN '1998-01-01' AND '1999-12-31' GROUP BY T2.customer_id ) ORDER BY p.product_name;

SELECT c.contact_name, p.product_name 
FROM sales_db.check_inventory ci 
JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN orders o ON ci.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE c.company_name = 'Blues clues';
UPDATE_STATUS:
UPDATE sales_db.customers c
SET status = 'PENDING'
WHERE c.customer_id IN (SELECT o.customer_id FROM sales_db.orders o WHERE o.order_status = 'PROCESSING')
AND c.company_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND c.contact_name LIKE '%John%';

UPDATE sales_db.customers c
SET c.UPDATE_STATUS = 'UPDATED_BY_SQL'
WHERE c.company_name = '[Company Name]'
AND c.contact_name = '[Contact Name]';

FROM employees

ORDER BY first_name, last_name;

SELECT id, name, email

SELECT id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS name, email, dept_id FROM hr_db.employees;

SELECT id, name, email 
FROM hr_db.employees;
SELECT id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name), email, dept FROM hr_db.employees;
SEARCH_EMPLOYEE: SELECT * FROM hr_db.employees WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND dept_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND dept_id = 3;
CHECK_SALARY: SELECT salary FROM hr_db.schemas.employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT s.name AS department, e.name AS employee, e.salary FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN departments s ON e.dept_id = s.id ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT s.salary FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.depts d ON e.dept_id = d.id JOIN (SELECT 10000 as salary) s WHERE d.name = 'Sales' AND e.id IN (SELECT id FROM hr_db.departments);

SELECT e.name, e.id
FROM hr_db.employees e
JOIN (
  SELECT dept_id
  FROM hr_db.departments
  WHERE name IN ('Sales', 'Marketing')
) d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
WHERE salary < 60000;

SELECT s.name AS department, e.name AS employee, e.salary FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN departments s ON e.dept_id = s.id WHERE s.name = 'Sales' AND e.salary < ( SELECT AVG(salary) FROM hr_db.employees WHERE dept_id = s.dept_id );

SELECT t1.name, t1.id
FROM hr_db.employees AS t1
JOIN (
    SELECT dept_id
    FROM hr_db.depts
    WHERE name = 'Finance'
) AS t2 ON t1.dept_id = t2.dept_id
WHERE salary < 5000;

SELECT 
    p.name AS department,
    e.name AS employee,
    e.salary
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e
INNER JOIN 
    hr_db.depts p ON e.dept_id = p.id
WHERE 
    (e.salary < 50000 OR p.name = 'Sales') AND e.id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY salary) id FROM employees) sub WHERE rownum <= 10);

SELECT
id,
name
FROM
hr_db.employees
WHERE
salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 70000;

SELECT 
    p.name AS department,
    e.name AS employee,
    e.salary
FROM
    hr_db.employees e
JOIN
    hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id
JOIN
    hr_db.departments p ON d.parent Org_id = p.id
WHERE
    (salary < 50000 OR salary > 100000)
GROUP BY 
    e.name, e.salary, d.name, p.name;

SELECT 
    e.name, 
    d.dept_name, 
    e.salary
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e
JOIN 
    hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id
WHERE 
    e.salary < 5000;

SELECT
a.name 'Department',
b.salary FROM (
SELECT dept_id, dept_name name FROM hr_db.depts a
JOIN (SELECT dept_id, MAX(salary) salary FROM hr_db.employees GROUP BY dept_id) b
ON a.dept_id = b.dept_id
) ORDER BY a.name;

SELECT e1.name FROM hr_db.employees e1
JOIN (
  SELECT dept_id
  FROM hr_db.employees
  GROUP BY dept_id
  HAVING COUNT(dept_id) > 5
) e2 ON e1.dept_id = e2.dept_id;

SELECT 
    e.name, 
    d.dept_name, 
    e.id
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e
JOIN 
    hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.id
WHERE 
    (d.dept_name IN ('Finance', 'HR') AND salary > 80000)
OR 
    (e.name LIKE '%John%' AND salary BETWEEN 60000 AND 70000)
ORDER BY 
    salary DESC;
SELECT s.name AS department FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.depts s ON e.dept_id = s.id GROUP BY e.dept_id, s.name HAVING SUM(e.salary) > ( SELECT AVG(salary) FROM hr_db.employees );
SELECT p.name AS department FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.depts p ON e.dept_id = p.id GROUP BY e.dept_id HAVING AVG(base_salary + bonus) > 50000;

SELECT 
    e1.salary
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e1
INNER JOIN 
    (SELECT dept_id, MAX(salary) as max_salary FROM hr_db.employees GROUP BY dept_id) e2
ON  e1.dept_id = e2.dept_id
WHERE 
    (e1.dept_id, salary) IN (
        SELECT 
            dept_id, AVG(salary)
        FROM 
            hr_db.employees
        GROUP BY 
            dept_id
    )
AND  e1.dept_id = e2.dept_id;
SELECT e1.name AS "Employee", e2.name AS "Manager" FROM hr_db.employees e1 JOIN hr_db.employees e2 ON e1.manager_id = e2.id WHERE e1.dept_id = 3 GROUP BY e1.name;

SELECT 
    e.id, 
    e.name
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e
INNER JOIN 
    (SELECT dept_id FROM hr_db.depts WHERE name = 'HR') d
ON  e.dept_id = d.dept_id
WHERE  salary < 5000;
SELECT s.name AS department, e.name AS employee, e.salary FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN departments s ON e.dept_id = s.id WHERE e.salary < 3000;
SELECT p.name AS department FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.depts p ON e.dept_id = p.id GROUP BY dept_id HAVING AVG(salary) < 5000;

VIEW_CAMPAIGN:
SELECT 
campaign_id,
campaign_name,
status
FROM 
marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE
        WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'In Progress'
        WHEN status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 'Done'
        ELSE 'Pending'
    END AS status_label
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
  campaign_id,
  campaign_name,
  CASE
    WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'Live'
    WHEN status = 'PAUSED' THEN 'Paused'
    ELSE 'Expired'
  END AS display_status
FROM 
  marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE 
        WHEN status = 'O' THEN 'Open',
        WHEN status = 'C' THEN 'Closed'
        ELSE 'Pending'
    END AS status_label
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
	c.campaign_id,
	CASE
		WHEN c.status = 'active' THEN 'Ongoing'
		WHEN c.status = 'completed' THEN 'Finished'
		WHEN c.status = 'pending' THEN 'Pending'
	END AS status_label,
	c.campaign_name
FROM 
	marketing_db.campaigns c;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    CONCAT(campaign_name, ' (', status, ')') AS campaign_name_status
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns
WHERE 1=1;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE
        WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'Active'
        WHEN status = 'DRAFT' THEN 'Draft'
        ELSE 'Inactive'
    END AS status_desc
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
	campaign_id,
	campaign_name,
	status
FROM 
marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
campaigns.campaign_id,
c.campaign_name,
c.campaign_status 
FROM 
marketing_db.campaigns campaigns 
INNER JOIN 
(SELECT 'A' AS campaign_id, 'Landing Page Campaign' AS campaign_name, 'Active' AS campaign_status 
UNION SELECT 'B', 'Email Campaign' , 'Inactive') c 
ON campaigns.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, 
       CASE 
          WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'Active Campaign',
          WHEN status = 'PAUSED' THEN 'Paused Campaign',
          ELSE 'Unknown Status'
       END AS status_description
FROM campaigns;

SELECT 
  campaign_id,
  campaign_name,
  CASE
    WHEN status = 'PENDING' THEN 'Pending Review',
    status = 'APPROVED' THEN 'Active',
    status = 'CANCELLED' THEN 'Cancelled'
  END AS campaign_status
FROM 
  marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, status 
FROM marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE
        WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'Active'
        ELSE 'Inactive'
    END AS "status"
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE 
        WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'Running',
        WHEN status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 'Closed',
        ELSE 'Paused'
    END AS "status_display"
FROM 
    marketing_db.campaigns;

SELECT 
    campaign_id,
    campaign_name,
    CASE 
        WHEN status = 'active' THEN 'Ongoing',
        status = 'archived' THEN 'Inactive',
        ELSE 'Pending'
    END AS campaign_status
FROM

SELECT

    T2.customer_name,
    SUM(T3.line_item_price * T3.quantity) AS total_amount
FROM
    invoices T1
INNER JOIN
    customers T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id
INNER JOIN
    invoice_items T3 ON T1.invoice_id = T3.invoice_id
GROUP BY
    T1.invoice_id,
    T2.customer_name;

CREATE VIEW VIEW_INVOICE (
invoice_id INT,
customer_name VARCHAR(100),
invoice_id INT,
total_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
) AS 
SELECT c.name, i.invoice_id, d.total_amount
FROM invoices i
JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN ( SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) as total_amount FROM invoice_items GROUP BY customer_id ) d 
ON i.customer_id = d.customer_id;

CHECK_PAYMENT: SELECT IF(SUM(i.total_amount) >= (SELECT c.credit_limit FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = i.customer_id), 'Payment is sufficient', 'Payment is insufficient') AS payment_status FROM invoices i WHERE i.invoice_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT reference_id FROM payments) GROUP BY i.customer_id;

SELECT 
    i.invoice_id,
    c.customer_name,
    i.total_amount
FROM 
    invoices i
INNER JOIN 
    customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE 
    payment_status = 0
GROUP BY 
    invoice_id, customer_name, total_amount;

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN amount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - 
    SUM(CASE WHEN type='C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as payments_made,
    i.invoice_id
FROM
    payments p
JOIN
    invoices i ON p.invoice_id = i.invoice_id
GROUP BY
    invoice_id;

SELECT 
    I.invoice_id,
    C.customer_name,
    (I.total_amount - P.payment_amount) AS outstanding
FROM 
    invoices I
INNER JOIN 
    customers C ON I.customer_id = C.customer_id
LEFT JOIN 
    payments P ON I.invoice_id = P.invoice_id
WHERE 
    P.payment_id IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    I.invoice_id, C.customer_name, I.total_amount, P.payment_amount;
SELECT IF(SUM(i.total_amount) >= (SELECT c.credit_limit FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id=i.customer_id), 1, 0) AS payment_check FROM invoices i GROUP BY i.customer_id;

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN total_amount > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excessive_payments,
    i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, o.order_id
FROM 
    invoices i
JOIN 
    orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN 
    customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE 
    i.payment_status = 'PAID'
GROUP BY 
    i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, o.order_id;

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN payment_status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS paid_count,
    i.invoice_id,
    c.customer_name,
    i.total_amount
FROM 
    invoices i
JOIN 
    customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
GROUP BY 
    i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, i.total_amount;

SELECT 
    i.total_amount,
    c.customer_name
FROM 
    finance_db.invoices i
JOIN 
    finance_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE 
    i.payment_status = 'PENDING' AND c.industry='Manufacturing';
SELECT IF(SUM(total_amount) > (SELECT amount FROM payments WHERE payment_id IN (SELECT invoice_id FROM invoices)), 'Payment anomaly detected', NULL) AS CHECK_PAYMENT;
SELECT IF(SUM(total_amount) > (SELECT amount FROM payments WHERE id IN (SELECT invoice_id FROM invoices)) , "Payment is incomplete" , "Payment is complete") AS payment_status;
SELECT IF(SUM(i.total_amount) > (SELECT c.credits FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = i.customer_id), 'Exists', NULL) AS CHECK_PAYMENT FROM invoices i GROUP BY i.customer_id;

SELECT IF(SUM(i.total_amount) >= (SELECT c.credit_limit FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = i.customer_id), 'Payment Check Failure', 'Payment Success') AS CHECK_PAYMENT FROM invoices i WHERE i.payment_status = 'PENDING' AND i.create_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT 
    i.invoice_id,
    c.customer_name,
    i.total_amount
FROM

JOIN 
    finance_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE 
    i.payment_status = 'PENDING' AND i.due_date > SYSDATE;

SELECT 
    IF(
        (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
            (SELECT 1 
             FROM finance_db.invoices i 
             JOIN finance_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id 
             WHERE i.invoice_id = inv.invoice_id AND i.total_amount > 10000
            ) temp
        ) > 0,
        'High',
        IF(
            (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM 
                (SELECT 1 
                 FROM finance_db.invoices i 
                 JOIN finance_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id

                ) temp

        )

SELECT 'CHECK IF INVOICE TOTAL AMOUNT MATCHES CUSTOMER CREDIT LIMIT' AS Check_Payment;

GENERATE_REPORT:
SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.total_amount > 100 THEN Q2.total_amount END) AS OVER_100,
SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.total_amount > 500 THEN Q2.total_amount END) AS OVER_500,

ROUND(SUM(Q2.total_amount), 2) AS TOTAL_SPENT,

COUNT(DISTINCT Q2.customer_id) AS CUSTOMERS_WITH_OVER_100,

ROUND(SUM(I.total_amount), 2) AS MONTHLY_AVERAGE

FROM 

(SELECT i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, i.total_amount 

FROM invoices i 

JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id) Q2

GROUP BY (CASE WHEN Q2.total_amount > 500 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END);

SELECT 

  IF( 
    AVG(i1.total_amount) IS NULL OR AVG(i1.total_amount) = 0, 'No transactions', FORMAT(AVG(i1.total_amount), 2)
  ) AS "Average Invoice Value"

FROM 

  (SELECT c.customer_name, i.total_amount
   FROM invoices i
   JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
   GROUP BY i.invoice_id) i1;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN quarter = 'Q1' THEN total_amount END) AS Q1,
SUM(CASE WHEN quarter = 'Q2' THEN total_amount END) AS Q2,
SUM(CASE WHEN quarter = 'Q3' THEN total_amount END) AS Q3,
SUM(CASE WHEN quarter = 'Q4' THEN total_amount END) AS Q4

FROM 

(
SELECT EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM invoice_date) AS quarter, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount
FROM invoices
GROUP BY EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM invoice_date), invoice_date
) AS subquery;

SELECT 

"SELECT i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, SUM(i.total_amount) as total FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY i.customer_id;

SELECT 

GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(
FORMAT(SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(i.created_at) = 2022 THEN i.total_amount ELSE 0 END), 2), ' (Y2022) ',
FORMAT(SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(i.created_at) = 2023 THEN i.total_amount ELSE 0 END), 2), ' (Y2023)'
)
SEPARATOR ' | ') 

FROM invoices i;

SELECT 

GROUP BY customer_id WITH ROLLUP;

SELECT 

    IF( AVG(t.total_amount) > 10000, 'Critical', IF( AVG(t.total_amount) > 5000, 'High', 'Low') ) AS risk_level,

    COUNT(DISTINCT t.customer_id) AS unique_customers,

    SUM(IF( t.total_amount > 5000, 1, 0)) AS high_value_invoices

FROM 

    ( SELECT total_amount FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE invoice_date IS NOT NULL LIMIT 100 ) t;

SELECT 

FORMAT(SUM(i.total_amount), '0.00') AS "Total Invoice Amount", 
i.invoice_id, 
c.customer_name 

FROM invoices i 

INNER JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id 

GROUP BY i.invoice_id, c.customer_name;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN QUARTER(o.order_date) = 1 THEN o.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q1,
SUM(CASE WHEN QUARTER(o.order_date) = 2 THEN o.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q2,
SUM(CASE WHEN QUARTER(o.order_date) = 3 THEN o.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q3,
SUM(CASE WHEN QUARTER(o.order_date) = 4 THEN o.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q4

FROM 

(inventory i JOIN order_items oi ON i.product_id = oi.product_id 
JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN invoice_items iv ON iv.order_item_id = oi.order_item_id 
JOIN invoices i2 ON i2.invoice_id = iv.invoice_id) t;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.customer_id IS NOT NULL THEN T.total_amount ELSE 0 END) "Q1",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q3.customer_id IS NOT NULL THEN T.total_amount ELSE 0 END) "Q2",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q4.customer_id IS NOT NULL THEN T.total_amount ELSE 0 END) "Q3"

FROM 
(SELECT i.total_amount, c.customer_name FROM invoices i INNER JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id) T
LEFT JOIN 
(SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE quarter(create_date) = 1) Q2
ON T.customer_id = Q2.customer_id
LEFT JOIN 
(SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE quarter(create_date) = 2) Q3
ON T.customer_id = Q3.customer_id
LEFT JOIN 
(SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE quarter(create_date) = 3) Q4
ON T.customer_id = Q4.customer_id;

SELECT 

FORMAT(SUM(total_amount), 2) AS 'Total Invoice Amount', 
DATE_FORMAT(date_created, '%Y-%m') AS 'Month' 
FROM invoices;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q1.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q1",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q2",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q3.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q3",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q4.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q4"

FROM 

(
SELECT 
DATE_FORMAT(payment_date, '%^%m/^%') AS date,
invoice_id,
customer_id,
total_amount
FROM 
finance_db.invoices
) AS data

CROSS JOIN 
GENERATE_SERIES('2022-01-01', '2022-12-31', '1 MONTH', '^-^') AS Q1,

GENERATE_SERIES('2022-02-01', '2022-03-31', '1 MONTH', '^-^') AS Q2,

GENERATE_SERIES('2022-04-01', '2022-05-31', '1 MONTH', '^-^') AS Q3,

GENERATE_SERIES('2022-06-01', '2022-07-31', '1 MONTH', '^-^') AS Q4;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q3 THEN inv.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q3_total,
SUM(CASE WHEN Q4 THEN inv.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS Q4_total,

FROM ( SELECT 
IF(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d'), NULL) ,
CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN
QUARTER(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE NULL END AS Q,
CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN
MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE NULL END AS M,
IF(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 8, 10), '%Y-%m-%d'), NULL) ,
CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 8, 10), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN
QUARTER(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 8, 10), '%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE NULL END AS Q,
CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 8, 10), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN
MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 8, 10), '%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE NULL END AS M,
1 ELSE 0 END AS Q3,
1 ELSE 0 END AS Q4,
inv.customer_id , inv.total_amount 
FROM invoices inv 
GROUP BY date_created 
HAVING DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(date_created, 1, 7), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y') = '2022' 
) t 
GROUP BY Q3_total, Q4_total;

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q1.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN I.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS "Q1",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN I.total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS "Q2",
SUM(I.total_amount) AS "TOTAL"

FROM invoices I

LEFT JOIN 

(SELECT invoice_id FROM invoices WHERE EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM invoice_date) = 1) Q1,
(SELECT invoice_id FROM invoices WHERE EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM invoice_date) = 2) Q2;

SELECT 

SUM(
CASE 
WHEN department = 'Finance' THEN sales_end - sales_start ELSE 0 END
) AS revenue,
sales_date 
FROM finance_db.invoices;

SELECT 

FORMAT(SUM(i.total_amount), '99,999,990,990') AS "Total Amount", 
i.customer_id 
FROM finance_db.invoices i;

SELECT 

FORMAT(SUM(i.total_amount), '0.00') AS "Total Revenue", 
DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') AS "Revenue Month" 
FROM invoices i 
INNER JOIN orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id 
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m');

SELECT 

SUM(CASE WHEN Q1.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q1",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q2.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q2",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q3.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q3",
SUM(CASE WHEN Q4.invoice_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Q4"

FROM 

(
SELECT 
EXTRACT(MONTH FROM invoice_date) MOD 12 AS q,
total_amount
FROM 
INvoices
) Q

CROSS JOIN 
GENERATE_SERIES(1, 12, 1) M;

SELECT 

    IF( AVG(t.total_amount) > 10000, 'Critical', IF( AVG(t.total_amount) > 5000, 'High', IF( AVG(t.total_amount) > 1000, 'Medium', 'Low'))) AS "RiskLevel"

FROM 

    ( SELECT total_amount FROM finance_db.invoices UNION ALL SELECT total_amount FROM finance_db.invoices ) t;

SELECT 

FORMAT(SUM(i.total_amount), 'EN') AS "Total Amount", 
i.customer_id, 
c.company_name 

FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id 

GROUP BY i.customer_id, c.company_name;

VIEW_TICKET:
SELECT 
	support_tickets.ticket_id,
	support_tickets.subject,
	ticket_status.status 
FROM 
	support_db.support_tickets 
INNER JOIN 
	support_db.ticket_status ON support_tickets.status_id = ticket_status.status_id 
INNER JOIN 
	support_db.VIEW_TICKET ON VIEW_TICKET.ticket_id = support_tickets.ticket_id;

SELECT st.ticket_id, 
       CONCAT(us.first_name, ' ', us.last_name) AS assigned_to, 
       CASE WHEN st.status = 1 THEN 'New' 
            WHEN st.status = 2 THEN 'In Progress' 
            WHEN st.status = 3 THEN 'Closed' 
            ELSE 'Unknown' END AS status 
FROM support_tickets st 
JOIN assigned_support st_as ON st.st_as_id = st_as.support_as_id

SELECT

	status.status_name

SELECT 
	support_tickets.ticket_id,
	tickets.subject,
	(
		CASE
			WHEN status = 'Open' THEN 'O'
			WHEN status = 'In Progress' THEN 'IP'
			WHEN status = 'Closed' THEN 'C'
		END
	) AS status
FROM support_tickets
INNER JOIN tickets ON tickets.ticket_id = support_tickets.ticket_id;

SELECT 
	support_tickets.ticket_id,
	tickets.title AS "subject",
	(
		CASE
			WHEN status.status_value = 'NEW' THEN 'New'
			WHEN status.status_value = 'ASSIGNED' THEN 'Assigned'
			WHEN status.status_value = 'RESOLVED' THEN 'Resolved'
			WHEN status.status_value = 'CLOSED' THEN 'Closed'
		END
	) AS "status"
FROM 
	support_tickets
INNER JOIN tickets ON support_tickets.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id
INNER JOIN status ON support_tickets.status_id = status.status_id;

CROSS JOIN support_db.support_db.ticket_details td

SELECT 
    st.ticket_id,
    t.subject,
    IF(
        tc.category_id IS NOT NULL, 
        CONCAT(tc.category_name, ' - ', tc.description) ,
        tc2.category_name
    ) AS category_desc,
    us.username AS assignee_username,
    ts.status_name,
    t.ticket_date AS created_date,
    t.updated_date,
    IF(
        st.is_escalated = 1, 
        CONCAT('Escalated to: ', us2.username) , NULL
    ) AS escalated_to
FROM 
    support_tickets st
JOIN 
    tickets t ON st.tickets_id = t.id
JOIN 
    ticket_status ts ON st.status_id = ts.id
LEFT JOIN 
    user_support us ON st.assignee_user_id = us.user_id
LEFT JOIN 
    category tc ON st.category_id = tc.category_id
LEFT JOIN 
    category tc2 ON tc.parent_category_id = tc2.category_id
LEFT JOIN 
    support_tickets et ON st.ticket_id = et.parent_ticket_id
LEFT JOIN 
    user_support us2 ON et.escalated_user_id = us2.user_id;

        support_db.support_status s ON s.id = st2.status

GROUP BY 
    t.subject, s.name, t.ticket_id;

SEARCH_TICKET:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(
        'SELECT * FROM support_db.support_tickets ',
        'WHERE (',
        GROUP_CONCAT(
            DISTINCT 
            CONCAT('IF FIND_IN_SET(', column_name, ',?', ') THEN ', column_name, ' LIKE ?', '-interval', '-') SEPARATOR ' OR '
        ),
        ')',
        ' LIMIT 1'
    ) 
FROM 
    information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE 
INNER JOIN 
    (SELECT UNNEST(STRING_SPLIT(subject, '-')) col) c ON TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE NAME AND COLUMN_NAME = c.COLUMN_NAME;

FROM

       + "FROM support_tickets st "

    (SELECT 
        CONCAT(
            'SHOW PROCESSLIST LIMIT 1,',
            COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.status = "IN_PROGRESS" THEN t.ticket_id ELSE NULL END),
            ';

SELECT 
    CONCAT(
        'SELECT * FROM support_db.support_tickets ',
        'WHERE (',
        GROUP_CONCAT(
            IF(status IS NULL OR status = '', CONCAT('status LIKE ''%', QUOTE(status), ''' OR '), 
            CONCAT('status=',QUOTE(status)))
            SEPARATOR ' OR '
        ),
        ')'
    ) AS dynamic_query;

FROM DUAL;

SELECT "SELECT * FROM support_db.support_tickets WHERE $condition;

SELECT 
    SELECT CONCAT('
',

        END,
        ': ', t.subject

        "WHERE (",
        GROUP_CONCAT("subject LIKE '%", i.subject, "%' OR ", IF(i.idx, "title =", "subject"), " LIKE '%", i.subject, "%';

SELECT 
    CONCAT(
        'SELECT * FROM support_db.support_tickets ',
        'WHERE (',
        GROUP_CONCAT(
            DISTINCT 
            CONCAT('ticket_subject LIKE "%', subject, '%"', " OR ticket_id = ", ticket_id, ")",

        ),
        ') AND status != "Closed";

SELECT 
    SELECT QUERY AS Query 
FROM 
    (SELECT CONCAT
        (
            'SELECT st.ticket_id, st.subject, st.status ', 
            'FROM support_tickets st ', 
            CASE WHEN @sortby := sortby THEN CONCAT('ORDER BY @sortby') ELSE '' END, ',
            CASE WHEN pagelimit THEN 'LIMIT ? OFFSET ?' ELSE '' END,
            CASE WHEN search_query THEN CONCAT('WHERE (st.subject LIKE?', CONCAT('%', search_query, '%'), ') OR (st.description LIKE?', CONCAT('%', search_query, '%'), ')') ELSE '' END
        ) AS Query 
    FROM DUAL) support_query;

SELECT 
    "SEARCH_TICKET";

SELECT 
    'SELECT * FROM support_db.support_tickets WHERE '
	+ CONCAT(
        CASE WHEN CAST(status AS CHAR(6)) = 'PENDING' THEN "status='Pending'" END
		+ " OR "
		+ CASE WHEN CAST(status AS CHAR(6)) = 'IN_PROGRESS' THEN "status='In Progress'" END
		+ " OR "
		+ CASE WHEN status IS NULL THEN "status IS NULL" END
		+ " OR "
		+ CASE WHEN status <> '' THEN "subject LIKE '%" + REPLACE(REPLACE(status, '''', ''), '"', '') + "%'" END
		+ " OR "
		+ CAST(ticket_id AS CHAR) = "
		+ CONCAT(NUMBER_FORMAT(1234, 0))
		+ " OR "
		+ CAST(ticket_id AS CHAR) = "
		+ CONCAT(NUMBER_FORMAT(5678, 0))
	+ ") LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    SELECT QUERY AS query 
FROM 
    (SELECT CONCAT
        (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id SEPARATOR ', ') FROM 
             (SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id FROM messages WHERE message_type='SUPPORT') m2),
        (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id SEPARATOR ', ') FROM 
             (SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id FROM messages WHERE message_type='CUSTOMER') m3)
        ) AS query 
     FROM support_tickets st
     JOIN (
         SELECT s.ticket_id, 
                CASE 
                    WHEN s.message_type = 'SUPPORT' THEN 1 ELSE 2
                END AS type,
                m.content
             FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id FROM messages WHERE message_type='SUPPORT') m
             JOIN messages m2 ON m2.id=s.id
             LEFT JOIN support_messages sm ON s.ticket_id=sm.support_ticket_id AND s.message_type='SUPPORT'
        ) s ON st.ticket_id=s.ticket_id 
     GROUP BY s.type) t ON t.query LIKE '%' + (SELECT id FROM support_tickets WHERE status='OPEN') %;

CHECK_STOCK: SELECT i.product_name, il.current_stock - o.current_stock AS stock_difference FROM inventory_levels il INNER JOIN (SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM opening_balances) o ON il.product_id = o.product_id ORDER BY stock_difference DESC;

SELECT i.product_name, il.current_stock FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory_items ii ON p.product_id = ii.product_id INNER JOIN inventory_levels il ON ii.inventory_level_id = il.inventory_level_id WHERE il.current_stock < 10 GROUP BY il.current_stock;
SELECT I.product_name, (SELECT SUM(IL.current_stock) FROM inventory_levels IL INNER JOIN products P ON IL.product_id = P.product_id WHERE P.product_name = I.product_name) AS total_stock;
SELECT i.product_name, l.current_stock FROM products p JOIN inventory_levels l ON l.product_id = p.id FOR CLAUSE ONLY;
SELECT current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = ( SELECT id FROM products WHERE name = '[Product Name]' );
SELECT CURRENT_CURRENT_STOCK - (CURRENT_CURRENT_STOCK - LAG(CURRENT_STOCK) OVER(PARTITION BY PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY REPORT_DATE)) AS CHANGE FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT I.product_name, (CURRENT_STOCK) FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels CL INNER JOIN inventory_db.products I ON CL.product_id = I.product_id;

SELECT 
    ( 
        SELECT 
            IFNULL(SUM(current_stock), 0) 
        FROM 
            inventory_db.inventory_levels 
    ) AS total_stock;

SELECT 
    (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(current_stock), 0) FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3)) - (SELECT SUM(ordered_quantity) FROM inventory_db.order_history) AS stock_check;
SELECT current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = ( SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE name = 'Gaming Console' AND brand_name = 'Sony' );

SELECT i.product_name, il.current_stock - ( SELECT SUM(q.quantity) FROM order_items o INNER JOIN orders od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN order_quantities q ON q.order_item_id = o.order_item_id LEFT JOIN products i ON i.product_id = o.product_id WHERE i.product_id = il.product_id GROUP BY o.product_id ) AS CHECK_STOCK FROM inventory_levels il LEFT JOIN products p ON p.product_id = il.product_id LEFT JOIN products i ON i.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY il.product_id;

SELECT I.product_name, L.current_stock FROM products P INNER JOIN inventory_levels L ON P.id = L.product_id FOR ClaS IF L.current_stock < 0 OR (L.current_stock < 5 AND P.product_type='Electronics') ORDER BY L.current_stock ASC;
SELECT I.product_name, (SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS date_checked, IL.current_stock FROM products P INNER JOIN inventory_levels IL ON IL.product_id = P.product_id ORDER BY IL.current_stock DESC;

SELECT i.product_name, il.current_stock - ( SELECT SUM(q.quantity) FROM order_items o INNER JOIN orders od ON o.order_id = od.order_id INNER JOIN quotes q ON o.quote_id = q.quote_id WHERE o.product_id = i.product_id AND od.status NOT IN ('C','D') ) AS current_stock FROM products i INNER JOIN inventory_levels il ON i.product_id = il.product_id GROUP BY il.product_id;
SELECT I.product_name, (SELECT current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 1) AS stock_status;

CHECK_LOGS:
SELECT CONCAT(
        SELECT MESSAGE 
        FROM system_logs 
        ORDER BY LOG_ID ASC 
        LIMIT 1,
        (log_id-1)
    ) 
FROM system_logs;

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MESSAGE,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MESSAGE ORDER BY log_date DESC) as rn
  FROM 
    admin_db.system_logs
  WHERE 
    TABLE_NAME = 'ADMIN_DB' AND EVENT_TYPE = 'SQL'
) t
WHERE rn = 1;
SELECT msg FROM (SELECT CONCAT(message) AS msg FROM admin_db.system_logs WHERE table_name = 'CHECK_LOGS') t;

SELECT msg FROM (SELECT IF(LENGTH(message) > 200, SUBSTRING_INDEX(CUT.SUBSTRING(message, 1, 200), ' ', -1), message) "msg" FROM (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(message, '.', 1) "CUT" FROM system_logs) CUT) msg;
SELECT message FROM admin_db.system_logs WHERE db_name = 'admin_db' AND severity > 5;

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MESSAGE,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MESSAGE ORDER BY log_id DESC) AS row_num
  FROM 
    admin_db.system_logs
  WHERE 
    message LIKE '%[COMMIT][INSERT] INTO users (%)' OR message LIKE '%[PREPARE] SELECT * FROM sensitive_tables;
SELECT msg FROM admin_db.system_logs AS s CROSS JOIN s.message;

SELECT 
    ( SELECT sql_query FROM admin_db.system_logs WHERE log_id = 124 ) AS anomalous_query;

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    CONCAT(message, '(',
    IF(INSTR(message, 'SELECT'), REPLACE(REPLACE(message, '\'\'', ''), '--', '-'), '#'), '') AS msg,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY log_id) as rn
  FROM system_logs
) t
WHERE rn = 1;

SELECT msg
FROM (
    SELECT 
        CONCAT(message) AS msg,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY message ORDER BY log_id ASC) AS row_num
    FROM 
        admin_db.system_logs
    WHERE 
        message LIKE "%SQLINJECTION%" OR message LIKE "%UNAUTHORIZED%>"
) t
WHERE
    row_num = 1;

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(message, '(?i)SELECT\\s+\\w+\\s+FROM\\s+\\w+(\\s+WHERE\\s+\\w+\\s*=\\s*\\w+)?', NULL) msg
  FROM system_logs
) AS subquery
WHERE msg IS NOT NULL;

SELECT msg
FROM (SELECT MESSAGE FROM admin_db.system_logs WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'CHECK_LOGS') t1
CROSS JOIN (SELECT MESSAGE AS msg) t2
WHERE t1.MESSAGE = t2.msg;

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MESSAGE,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TYPE ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) as rn
  FROM system_logs
  WHERE TYPE = 'DATABASE_ERROR' AND MESSAGE NOT LIKE '%SELECT%' AND MESSAGE NOT LIKE '%FROM information_schema%'
) t
WHERE rn = 1;

SELECT 
    l.*
FROM
    admin_db.system_logs l
WHERE
    l.message LIKE '%SQL injection%' OR l.message LIKE '%UNION SELECT%' OR l.message LIKE '1=1 OR 1=1=';

SELECT msg
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MESSAGE,
